channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 在克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）执导的传记大片《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）中，西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）扮演了原子弹制造者的角色，在登台领奖后，他称自己是一个 "非常自豪的爱尔兰人"。
item.description:
Cillian Murphy called himself a “very proud Irishman” after he trotted onstage to claim his first-ever Oscar for portraying the man who created the atomic bomb in Christopher Nolan’s blockbuster biopic “Oppenheimer.” https://t.co/4ndD494nSF

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 梅西登场了。这只边境牧羊犬因在奥斯卡提名影片《摔跤解剖学》中扮演史努比而赢得了大批粉丝，在开幕式独白时，它就坐在观众席上：
item.description:
Messi made the show. The border collie who gained an enormous fan base for playing Snoop in the Oscar-nominated film “Anatomy of a Fall" was seated in the audience during the opening monologue.

For more #Oscars moments: https://t.co/4xe9ZoeRke pic.twitter.com/PYTJ9agdBF

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 基地组织也门分支称领导人 Khalid al-Batarfi 死因不明
item.description:
Al-Qaida's Yemen branch says leader Khalid al-Batarfi dead in unclear circumstances https://t.co/5RHnX86hgh

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美联社消息称，拉塞尔-威尔逊已同意与钢人队签约 1 年
item.description:
Russell Wilson has agreed to sign a 1-year deal with the Steelers, AP source says https://t.co/DBKwfGT7Xs

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 这是《芭比娃娃》粉丝们期待已久的时刻：瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）在 #Oscars 颁奖典礼上演唱了 "I'm Just Ken"（我只是肯），这是电影中 80 年代的劲爆民谣。回顾当晚的重要时刻：
item.description:
It was the moment “Barbie” fans have been waiting for: Ryan Gosling performed “I’m Just Ken,” the huge ‘80s power ballad from the film, at the #Oscars.

Catch up on the night's big moments: https://t.co/3HuJC0jGf8 pic.twitter.com/4G8eGOK10w

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 青年活动团体共同支持拜登。他们说，拜登的成就比他的年龄更重要
item.description:
Youth activist groups jointly endorse Biden. They say his achievements matter more than his age https://t.co/9eB3BSJRwP

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: Billie Eilish 和 Finneas O'Connell 的 "Barbie "民谣 "What Was I Made For? "获得 #Oscars 最佳原创歌曲奖，22 岁的 Eilish 成为迄今为止获得两次奥斯卡奖的最年轻的获奖者。
item.description:
Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell's “Barbie” ballad “What Was I Made For?” won the award for best original song at the #Oscars — making Eilish, 22, the youngest person by far to have won two career Oscars. https://t.co/hV0vIxhHO6

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 最佳女配角得主达文-乔伊-伦道夫（Da'Vine Joy Randolph）说，她在《The Holdovers》中饰演的玛丽-兰姆（Mary Lamb）是写给黑人女性的一封 "情书"。
item.description:
Best supporting actress winner Da’Vine Joy Randolph said her role as Mary Lamb in “The Holdovers” was a “love letter” to Black women. pic.twitter.com/C5dPdL9Py0

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美联社为何撤回威尔士王妃腹部手术后的首张官方照片
item.description:
Why the AP retracted the first official photo of the Princess of Wales since her abdominal surgery https://t.co/eeLcS6hAwD

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 艾玛-斯通（Emma Stone）说，她因《可怜的事》（Poor Things）一角获得最佳女主角后 "晕了过去"。这是她职业生涯第二次获得该奖项。
item.description:
Emma Stone said she “blacked out” after winning best actress for her role in “Poor Things.” It was her second career victory in the category. pic.twitter.com/rG1M5pAja4

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周日，西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）凭借《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）一角获得最佳男主角，这是他首次获得奥斯卡奖。
item.description:
Cillian Murphy took home his first-ever Oscar on Sunday after winning best actor for his role in “Oppenheimer.” pic.twitter.com/w8DcdJqRyj

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州队以 79-72 击败路易斯安那州立大学队，赢得 SEC 锦标赛第 8 名。
item.description:
No. 1 South Carolina wins SEC Tournament over No. 8 LSU 79-72 in game marred by skirmish, ejections https://t.co/YsgESu4y4s

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在首次获得奥斯卡提名三十年后，小罗伯特-唐尼赢得了他的第一个奥斯卡奖。
item.description:
Three decades after receiving his first Academy Award nomination, Robert Downey Jr. won his first Oscar. https://t.co/LGSUK5wEY1 pic.twitter.com/bULR7RopDc

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周日晚，克里斯托弗-诺兰因执导《奥本海默》而首次获得奥斯卡奖，随后又获得最佳影片奖。这位 53 岁的英国电影制作人在其职业生涯中一直备受好评，但在此之前从未在奥斯卡上获奖。
item.description:
Christopher Nolan won his first Oscar on Sunday night for directing “Oppenheimer” and then another for best picture.

The 53-year-old British filmmaker has garnered critical acclaim throughout his career, but had never won at the Oscars until now. pic.twitter.com/Ajvcy3ch6z

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: Da'Vine Joy Randolph 凭借在《The Holdovers》中的角色首次获得 #Oscar 奖。现在我意识到我只需要做我自己，"她在领奖时说道。
item.description:
Da’Vine Joy Randolph won her first #Oscar for her role in "The Holdovers."

“I always wanted to be different. Now I realize I just need to be myself," she said while accepting the award. https://t.co/TxliePzIkv pic.twitter.com/cEXyNtAzFT

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: Billie Eilish、Ramy Youssef、Ava DuVernay 和其他名人在奥斯卡颁奖典礼上佩戴红色胸针，支持加沙停火。徽章上的图案是一只手托着一颗心，由 "艺术家4停火"（Artists4Ceasefire）组织设计。
item.description:
Billie Eilish, Ramy Youssef, Ava DuVernay and other celebrities wore red pins at the Oscars in support for a cease-fire in Gaza. The design featured a single hand holding a heart and was organized by the group Artists4Ceasefire. pic.twitter.com/sj6HBzsoYi

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》在与莉莉-格拉德斯通的激烈角逐中赢得职业生涯第二座奥斯卡最佳女主角奖杯
item.description:
Emma Stone wins second career best actress Oscar for 'Poor Things' in tight race with Lily Gladstone https://t.co/QLaSgtIBug

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 马里乌波尔 20 天》导演 Mstyslav Chernov 在获得奥斯卡最佳纪录片奖后说，他希望这部影片能提醒人们乌克兰的 "人道主义灾难"。
item.description:
After winning the Oscar for best documentary feature, “20 Days in Mariupol” director Mstyslav Chernov said he hopes the film reminds people of the “humanitarian catastrophe” in Ukraine. pic.twitter.com/gnDtT7Nmbo

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 奥本海默》获得奥斯卡最佳影片奖，讲述了一位理论物理学家监督原子弹研发的故事，该片共获得七项奥斯卡奖。
item.description:
Oppenheimer won the Academy Award for best picture, capping a seven-Oscar haul for the story of a theoretical physicist who oversaw the development of the atomic bomb. https://t.co/mZeCq6JCWi pic.twitter.com/7rrio49GQc

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》获得 #奥斯卡最佳女主角。
item.description:
Emma Stone won the #Oscar for best actress for "Poor Things."

Read more about the sumptuous, monstrous craft of the film.https://t.co/jLwB3dcISt

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》与《花月杀手》的莉莉-格拉德斯通经过激烈角逐，赢得职业生涯第二座奥斯卡最佳女主角奖杯。
item.description:
Emma Stone wins her second career best actress #Oscar for "Poor Things" after a tight awards race with Lily Gladstone of “Killers of the Flower Moon.” https://t.co/n9KnbkRg4U pic.twitter.com/cavANcFn27

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 西里安-墨菲凭借《奥本海默》中的角色获得 #奥斯卡最佳男主角。
item.description:
Cillian Murphy won the #Oscar for best actor for his role in "Oppenheimer."

Read more about what leading a Christopher Nolan film meant to him. https://t.co/DhbKdaqdxB

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 克里斯托弗-诺兰凭借《奥本海默》首次获得奥斯卡最佳导演奖。
item.description:
Christopher Nolan wins his first Academy Award for best director for "Oppenheimer." https://t.co/gC2NFtEpSN pic.twitter.com/Y7JTVpx3HT

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 西里安-墨菲凭借《奥本海默》中的男主角赢得奥斯卡最佳男演员奖。
item.description:
Cillian Murphy wins the #Oscar for best actor for playing the title role in "Oppenheimer." https://t.co/WaUSgnPYam pic.twitter.com/TIsZGk6cdf

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 穆斯林带着喜悦和深切的担忧迎接神圣的斋月
item.description:
Muslims welcome the holy month of Ramadan with a mix of joy and deep concern https://t.co/bJog7wEWeM

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: Billie Eilish 和 Finneas 凭借《芭比娃娃》中的 "What Was I Made For? "获得 #Oscar 最佳原创歌曲奖。
item.description:
Billie Eilish and Finneas won the #Oscar for best original song for "What Was I Made For?” from “Barbie.”

Eilish, who is 22 years old, is now the youngest person to have won two career Oscars. https://t.co/sERGuUgk9d pic.twitter.com/SMVYJQWu0Y

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林是 #Kenough.这位《芭比娃娃》的明星在 #Oscars 颁奖典礼上表演了《I'm Just Ken》，与他一起表演的还有电影原声带的执行制作人马克-朗森（Mark Ronson），以及一群跳着戏剧性舞蹈的 Kens，包括演员刘思沐和金斯利-本-阿迪尔（Kingsley Ben-Adir）。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling is #Kenough.

The "Barbie" star performed “I’m Just Ken" at the #Oscars.

He was joined by Mark Ronson, the executive producer of the film soundtrack, and a group of dramatic dancing Kens – including actors Simu Liu and Kingsley Ben-Adir. https://t.co/CFf2WQTRYK pic.twitter.com/t3U7eBuZwC

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: "最后的修理厂 "荣获 #奥斯卡最佳纪录短片奖。请阅读导演克里斯-鲍尔斯（Kris Bowers）接受美联社采访的内容。
item.description:
"The Last Repair Shop" won the #Oscar for best documentary short.

Read director Kris Bowers' AP interview. https://t.co/i0c8oV6boW

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 小罗伯特-唐尼凭借《奥本海默》中的角色获得 #奥斯卡最佳男配角。
item.description:
Robert Downey Jr. won the #Oscar for best supporting actor for his role in "Oppenheimer."

Read his takeaways from the film. https://t.co/UQLAwknVUQ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美联社以 "马里乌波尔的 20 天 "为题，描述了俄罗斯入侵乌克兰初期的惨痛经历，该片荣获奥斯卡最佳纪录片奖。
item.description:
"20 Days in Mariupol," AP's harrowing account of the early days of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, wins the Academy Award for best documentary. https://t.co/hLm59HEjbQ pic.twitter.com/g3tBU3ROPi

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024
